messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Head of Personnel's Desk
messages.body: HoP line is open guys

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Any cargo lads, we need a corgi crate

messages.author: Head of Personnel's Desk
messages.body: HoP line open we still need a botanist and a cook

messages.author: Head of Personnel's Desk
messages.body: We still need a cook and a botanist who wants the tak ?

messages.author: Head of Personnel's Desk
messages.body: We still needa botanist and a cook

messages.author: Captain's Desk
messages.body: Hey uh HoP, this will be the third time i say it, you are the department head, you can fill in until we get one, needlesdly potsing reminders to people who already have jobs is going to do nothing

messages.author: Head of Personnel's Desk
messages.body: HoP line is closed

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Ai position available, if anybody want to sacrifice themselves

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to [REDACTED], a swarm of energy draining parasites have swarmed into the maintenance areas.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Virgin station. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in Virgin station's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Virgin station. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to Ragnarok, a pack of wire eating mammals have descended into the maintenance areas.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Electrical Maintenance.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Alert

Gr3y.T1d3 virus detected in Virgin station door subroutines. Severity level of 1. Recommend station AI involvement.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Hey janiborg you gay, my ciggarette machine keeps shooting cigs at me

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Cap goin SSD forever, have a good shift guys (also HoP is in charge now and can somebody retrieve me from my bedroom? thanks)

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Virgin station. We apologize for the inconvenience.
